name: YellowBird
description:
Heya,

I though I want to bring back Flappy Bird, This is strictly a Clone, I want my friends to enjoy it so I brought it back for them. If you enjoy as well leave a comment and let me know ! :D 

Feel free to even donate if you do wish to do so, if You donate I will have more resources and development time / motivation to make games other than doing different areas of Work.

Feel free to Use this Game as you please and most importantly enjoy !
